content: kinnedy nichelle is the fourth square in a series that i am designing as a legacy for my grandchildren kinnedy loves volleyball and her four younger brothers she is kind and nurturing with a beautiful soul gauge is not important so use any yarn and applicable hook that you please the skill level is intermediate to advanced the 11 revised square has 39 stitches per side thank you to the testers - jovette aparna eva teresa janice fiona jenny mugginsquilts /people/mugginsquilts isabelle caroline caryn and louise you re the best **join my facebook group at ~ a yarn of serendipity crochet group 4 links to all my patterns are found on my blog 5 or pinterest 6 ** 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lauren-rose 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/macey-ann 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/marley-mae 4 https //www facebook com/groups/www ayarnofserendipity 5 http //pknightonhaener wordpress com 6 https //pin it/g7fcaloku2wutj
